backend/main.mo: Motoko actor exposing a query that returns static site info including name, tagline, and hero CTA.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report listing required IC configuration, deployment needs, and related files/components.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Text file containing prewritten summaries for all frontend components, pages, hooks, and config files.
frontend/DEPLOYMENT.md: Full deployment guide explaining prerequisites, local testing, and IC mainnet deployment steps for backend and frontend canisters.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base variables and dark mode tokens defining the site's color system and global styles.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point with meta tags, SEO data, and root mounting point loading main.jsx.
frontend/README.md: Frontend README describing prerequisites, setup steps, development commands, and project structure basics.
frontend/src/App.jsx: React app router setup using TanStack Router and next-themes to define all site routes with hash-based navigation.
frontend/src/App.tsx: TypeScript version of the app router configuring routes, theme provider, and TanStack Router type registration.
frontend/src/components/SiteFooter.tsx: Renders the site footer with branding, navigation links, social icons, and smooth-scrolling contact link behavior. Pulls site info from useSiteInfo.
frontend/src/components/SiteLayout.tsx: Wraps the app layout with theme provider, navbar, main content outlet, and footer. Ensures consistent page structure.
frontend/src/components/SiteNavbar.tsx: Provides a responsive navbar with navigation links, theme/preset controls, and a mobile drawer menu. Integrates theme switching and color presets.
frontend/src/components/TestimonialsSlid: Displays a carousel of static testimonials with navigation controls and rating stars. Manages active testimonial state and transitions.
frontend/src/components/ThemeColorProvid: Supplies theme color context using useThemeColor, exposing presets and preset switching. Wraps children with a context provider.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and caches an authenticated or anonymous backend actor with React Query, refetching dependent queries when identity changes. Returns actor instance and loading state.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Implements an Internet Identity provider using AuthClient, exposing identity state, login, logout, and status flags. Loads stored identities and manages authentication lifecycle.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Placeholder file intended for future backend-related React Query hooks. Currently exports nothing.
frontend/src/hooks/useSiteInfo.ts: Fetches site info from the backend actor with fallback static values, using React Query. Returns name, tagline, and loading/error state.
frontend/src/hooks/useThemeColor.ts: Defines theme color presets and a hook that loads, validates, applies, and stores the selected theme preset.
frontend/src/index.css: Sets global Tailwind-based styles and CSS variables for light/dark themes with extensive responsive rules.
frontend/src/main.jsx: Bootstraps the React app using ReactDOM, wrapping it with React Query and Internet Identity providers.
frontend/src/main.tsx: TypeScript version of the React app entry point, rendering App with QueryClient and InternetIdentity providers.
frontend/src/pages/About.tsx: Renders the About page with hero content, agency story, and value cards.
frontend/src/pages/Booking.tsx: Implements a booking form with state handling, preset package support, submission feedback, and a WhatsApp contact link.
frontend/src/pages/Home.tsx: Builds the home page with a hero section, featured destinations, contact form, and site info integration.
frontend/src/pages/HoneymoonOffers.tsx: Displays a list of honeymoon travel offers with details, images, and a hero section layout.
frontend/src/pages/Privacy.tsx: Renders the site's privacy policy using card sections outlining data collection and usage.
frontend/src/pages/Services.tsx: Shows a services overview page with hero sections and a grid of service cards like flights, hotels, and transportation.
frontend/src/pages/TourGuide.tsx: Presents information about tour guides, including hero content, explanatory text, images, and feature cards.
frontend/src/pages/TourPackages.tsx: Displays a list of tour packages with details, images, and a hero section for navigation.
frontend/src/pages/Vehicles.tsx: React page that displays a hero section and a grid of vehicle cards using predefined vehicle data.
frontend/src/utils/slug.ts: Utility functions to normalize, validate, and generate deterministic deployment-friendly slugs based on input or hostname.
frontend/src/vite-env.d.ts: TypeScript declaration file enabling Vite-specific types.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration with custom colors, fonts, animations, and container settings.
frontend/tsconfig.node.json: TypeScript config for Node-based tooling, configuring module resolution and compiler options for Vite.
frontend/vite.config.ts: Vite configuration enabling React, path aliases, env definition, dev server settings, and build output settings.
project_state.json: Project state metadata describing deployment issues, existing features, and pending feature requests.
